column1: Baby Barnaby's////A cozy brunch place in a small neighborhood. Parking is on the streets. This place is always crowded because of how popular it is. We already expected a wait when we came in and it was a doable wait. Tables are usually available according to the number of people you have. Just sign your name on the list and wait on the bench outside.The inside is really small but they have a few additional tables outside.
